name: Planets Delivered
description:
Play in Fullscreen!

Planets: Delivered! A diner-em-up style puzzle game where you build planets for aliens in need. 

  • 40+ Unique planets (4 Easter Egg Planets)
  • 10 Aliens
  • 15,000+ Possible scenarios
  • Reactive interface
  • Timer and high score keeper

Instructions:

Read the text on the left and edit the options on the right by clicking them. 

Controls:

Left Mouse - Click buttons on right hand side to change the properties of the planets.

Tips:

  • If somebody doesn't want something, they probably just want the middle ground. E.g: 'I hate when it's too cloudy out!' The probably just want an average cloud cover, not a lesser one.
  • The introduction doesn't weigh into their needs, it's just for flavor.
  • Running in fullscreen is optimal.
  • Thicker ozone leads to a colder planet because UV can't get in as easily, reducing the greenhouse effect.
  • The planets are assumed to have equal density at all sizes.
